General.Name: Zhejiang Whyis Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Whyis Technology Co. Ltd. provides information system integration and technical services. The company offers integrated solutions in the areas of project design, information system development, software and hardware procurement, and related operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: Block A, Huashi Science & Tech Park, Hangzhou, China, 311122
